alert.note: Alert for Hall; Hamilton; Merrick (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:20PM CDT until July 28 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Merrick County in central Nebraska... East central Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 519 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Phillips, or 9 miles east of Grand Island, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Hamilton, southwestern Merrick and east central Hall Counties. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 317 and 329. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
